Sholape
what did you add to your Stew?

Tired of that question? Heinz's new collection of stew sauces are made specifically for you to add flavor and a chef's touch to your stew.

Our Hottest Sauce

Heinz Chili Sauce

Freshly made from Our Eco Farm

We are proud to see every spicy sauce being created deep within the farms of Lagos Nigeria, crafted with the best local ball peppers to help create a world class sauce and deliver spiceness to the ingredient.

Empowering African Traders

We collaborated with a number of traders, farmers, and food vendors to bring you the best sauce right to your door, using the best local peppers available to make production simple and accessible to all.
